title: 过于生草
author: 雨韵
txt_content:
本帖最后由 雨韵 于 2020-3-30 14:09 编辑 

看图





屏幕截图(152).png (262.38 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2020-3-30 14:02 上传






联动帖子：https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-1002012-1-1.html

自己写的
我小时候喜欢玩的游戏有很多，其中最喜欢玩的还是Minecraft，这是一个沙盒游戏，玩家在里面可以自由发挥和创造。作为一个3D游戏，难得抛弃了现有的物理学，建筑学，材料学，动力学，天文学，以气死牛顿的代价，让玩家可以专心的实现内心庞大的建筑梦想。

When I was a child, I liked to play many games, among which minecraft was my favorite. This is a sandbox game in which players can play and create freely. As a 3D game, it is hard to abandon the existing physics, architecture, materials, dynamics, astronomy, at the cost of death of Newton, so that players can concentrate on the realization of their huge architectural dream.
